医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
推进治疗见解：利用 NanoBRET® 技术了解细胞靶标参与的影响在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与 Amy Landreman 讨论了 NanoBRET® 技术及其在细胞靶标参与中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Advancing-therapeutic-insights-The-impact-of-understanding-cellular-target-engagement-with-NanoBRETc2ae-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Advancing-therapeutic-insights-The-impact-of-understanding-cellular-target-engagement-with-NanoBRETc2ae-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5198682-9aef-462c-813d-d110929ccc30 Thu, 30 May 2024 05:17:00 -0400 Advancing therapeutic insights: The impact of understanding cellular target engagement with NanoBRET® technology
hnRNPM 在蛋白质合成精度中的保护作用被发现贝勒医学院和合作机构的研究人员发现，一种名为 hnRNPM 的蛋白质有助于保护细胞制造蛋白质过程的完整性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/hnRNPMs-protective-role-in- Protein-synthesis- precision-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/hnRNPMs-protective-role-in- Protein-synthesis- precision-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45d109bf-d9f8-414a-9b48-01fa5b2ef4ea Thu, 30 May 2024 04:04:42 -0400 hnRNPM's protective role in protein synthesis precision uncovered
创新型初创公司在替代蛋白质领域处于领先地位，以解决全球粮食危机《自然通讯》最近的一篇评论强调了创新型初创公司在推进替代蛋白质来源以应对全球粮食安全挑战并将这些努力转化为商业应用方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Innovative-startups-leading-the-charge-in-alternative- Proteins-to-solve-global-food-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Innovative-startups-leading-the-charge-in-alternative- Proteins-to-solve-global-food-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cb66e2e-c173-4326-b5ad-500fee6bfb32 Wed, 29 May 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Innovative startups leading the charge in alternative proteins to solve global food crisis
可食用机器人会成为食品和医药的未来吗？ 《自然评论材料》的一篇评论探讨了可食用材料在创造机器人食品和可食用机器人方面的潜力，强调了它们的治疗和环境效益，同时解决了当前的研究挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Could-edible-robots-be-the-future-of-food-and-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Could-edible-robots-be-the-future-of-food-and-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55bb7ed0-7217-4eb8-b08e-3b40886cef6d Wed, 29 May 2024 23:23:00 -0400 Could edible robots be the future of food and medicine?
运动诱发的运动素：疾病预防和治疗的秘密武器《信号转导和靶向治疗》最近的一篇综述强调了运动诱导分子运动因子在疾病预防和治疗中的作用，强调了它们的分子机制和治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Exercise-induced-exerkines-Secret-weapon-in-disease-prevention-and-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Exercise-induced-exerkines-Secret-weapon-in-disease-prevention-and-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3b28144-59c5-40f9-a41f-88e64eede1be Wed, 29 May 2024 22:37:00 -0400 Exercise-induced exerkines: Secret weapon in disease prevention and therapy
研究发现孕妇长期感染新冠病毒的可能性较小EClinicalMedicine 的一项新研究发现，与怀孕外感染相比，怀孕期间感染 SARS-CoV-2 与发生急性后遗症 (PASC) 的风险较低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Pregnant-women-less-likely-to-suffer-long-COVID-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Pregnant-women-less-likely-to-suffer-long-COVID-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6aee077c-63a6-4207-ae1c-e1ff4f2fd9a3 Wed, 29 May 2024 22:19:00 -0400 Pregnant women less likely to suffer long COVID, study finds
报告发现，多发性硬化症诊断延迟凸显了紧急研究和提高认识的必要性澳大利亚MS的一份新报告显示，诊断多发性硬化症的平均时间接近四年，凸显了增加研究投资和提高认识的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Delayed-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis-underscores-need-for-urgent-research-and-awareness-boost-report-find.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Delayed-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis-underscores-need-for-urgent-research-and-awareness-boost-report-find.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b3d9390-c64c-428d-8e06-556fab718cfb Wed, 29 May 2024 22:06:00 -0400 Delayed multiple sclerosis diagnosis underscores need for urgent research and awareness boost, report find
研究表明，有益于心脏健康的习惯可以让你在生理上保持年轻《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项新研究表明，心脏健康的生活方式因素与年轻的生物年龄和通过 DNA 甲基化降低心血管疾病风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Heart-healthy-habits-keep-you-biologically-young-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Heart-healthy-habits-keep-you-biologically-young-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=819c2d2a-6b20-4e0a-a383-8b6f47cf4e56 Wed, 29 May 2024 21:36:00 -0400 Heart-healthy habits keep you biologically young, study shows
具有里程碑意义的研究发现，早期食用花生可将过敏风险降低 71%最近发表在 NEJM Evidence 上的一项研究发现，从婴儿期到 5 岁定期喂养儿童花生制品可将青春期花生过敏率降低 71%，通过早期摄入过敏原提供长期预防https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Early-peanut-conspiration-slashes-allergy-risk-by-7125-landmark-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Early-peanut-conspiration-slashes-allergy-risk-by-7125-landmark-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d746b7d-295a-4a38-a4f7-14cc71e6b076 Wed, 29 May 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Early peanut consumption slashes allergy risk by 71%, landmark study finds
研究显示，口服索马鲁肽在改善糖尿病控制和心血管健康方面显示出巨大的前景《临床医学杂志》最近的一项研究发现，口服索马鲁肽治疗 24 周后可显着改善 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖控制并减轻体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Oral-semaglutide-shows-significant-promise-in-improving-diabetes-control-and-cardioangio-health-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Oral-semaglutide-shows-significant-promise-in-improving-diabetes-control-and-cardioangio-health-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=332902e2-44b5-4095-83dc-1e1814b4912c Wed, 29 May 2024 21:05:00 -0400 Oral semaglutide shows significant promise in improving diabetes control and cardiovascular health, study reveals
